subject: Any debugger that's worth anything these days works in a virtual machine.
body:
Installation disks can no longer be mailed. Evening 
will follow day.
There was undoubtedly a blinding flash of light. 
That's when I could see it all clearly.
Filters within the filter graph and the filter 
graph itself raise event notifications. That's when I decided Why should I care.
Fomenko including dynastic streams of Rome, 
Byzantine empire and England.
Again the lightning struck, and again, and again, 
in one continuous, raging roar from the heavens.
Afterwards he picked up the paper-apparently it 
gave him pleasure at least to read that I was dead, now that he had seen 
evidence to the contrary.
